<font color = white>&#34;.. loud. Hello. If you truly haven&#39;t turned into a Jiangshi or whatever. What, uh.. what were you doing? Your legs seem to work just fine, soooo.. were you playing a game or something? Walking on your hands like that? Or.. did you lose a bet?&#34;</font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff7c80"><a href=?src=[0x30000c1];action=name;character=ca666fbaf72d8fe2475c95438a72e1d5ff248468c8f2adc712cc5aee169b9a0a style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff7c80;">The police chief</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ff7c80"><font color = white> -Huh..</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc66ff><a href=?src=[0x30000c1];action=name;character=a74410993ad7da70127401a532b5912317aa4c8c5a49aeef3d42663bce70d922 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc66ff;">Hyuuga, Hinoue</a> smirked as she had caught the devil in the midst of a paradoxical crisis. A hand lifts offside of her mien, upwardly caressing hair before flicking it skywards through the fluorish of a wrist. Her logic was something that shattered him, and she would try to keep it up.

<font color = white>&#34;But, doesn&#39;t that mean... overall, your kicks would still be weaker? You don&#39;t give them one-hundred percent of your effort, as you usually would! But there&#39;s a trick to this...&#34;</font> There was?</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Just walk on your arms and legs at the same time.. like a bear.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000c1];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The handsome devil</a> put his fists back on his hips.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c1];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The handsome devil</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> I&#39;m okay with a little loss of power from my kicks if it means stronger punches.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc66ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c1];action=name;character=a74410993ad7da70127401a532b5912317aa4c8c5a49aeef3d42663bce70d922 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc66ff;">Hyuuga, Hinoue</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc66ff"><font color = white> Or lift heavy things whilst crouching all day.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c1];action=name;character=f114aa4bbfc48b9e0a6d4e32833fd1b7e7a3c8c90a380589ddad950c0c74f989 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The sleepy purple one</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> How will he eat?</font></font></font></span></span>

<font color = white>&#34;Oh trust me, I spotted quite a few promising... if not interesting, people already.&#34;</font> If both Kohaku and Batsu followed his gaze, they would see him glancing at Might, Try and then at both Hajime and Shishorama talking near the police officer.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000b6];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">The optimistic, bright boy</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> Just a thought.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff7c80><a href=?src=[0x30000b6];action=name;character=ca666fbaf72d8fe2475c95438a72e1d5ff248468c8f2adc712cc5aee169b9a0a style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff7c80;">The police chief</a> nimbly steps backward, putting some space between herself and the blonde. 
<font color = white>&#34;Hoh-kay. Whoever wants to play, line up on either side of the wealthy blonde!&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> That&#39;s too easy a way to make a bill disappear.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b6];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The handsome devil</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> That&#39;s whys tretching is important.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#a06d87"><a href=?src=[0x30000b6];action=name;character=7026d78d56a1fe983d2984f627d0b08bc99cdeb69fb899b3c7af8c72ade0049d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #a06d87;">The crimson eyed gambler</a> says:</b><span style="color:#a06d87"><font color = white> Ah she&#39;s gone.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b6];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The handsome devil</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> So what&#39;s the game?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#663300><a href=?src=[0x30000b6];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #663300;">The intense youngster</a> looms around the late bloomer with a bright smile. <font color = white>&#34;Your name?&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> I&#39;m unbeatable at anything except a language test.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako yells:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Do your worst!</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#8ed6b2"><a href=?src=[0x30000b6];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8ed6b2;">The kit with twin scarves</a> says:</b><span style="color:#8ed6b2"><font color = white> Shadduuuup, let her explain.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000b6];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">The sable-haired youth</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><font color = white> What type?</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff7c80><font color = white>&#34;The rules are simple! I&#39;ll be asking a question, and whoever answers correctly first gets to step forward. First one to pass-&#34;</font> 
A pause, as she drags her foot along the dirt to make a makeshift line.
<font color = white>&#34;- this spot here, wins. Ah- and if you give an incorrect answer, whether you&#39;re first or not, you have to step backwards. The winner will receive.. ryo! Any questions?&#34;</font><br>(<a href=?src=[0x30000b6];action=name;character=ca666fbaf72d8fe2475c95438a72e1d5ff248468c8f2adc712cc5aee169b9a0a style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff7c80;">The police chief</a>)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000b6];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">The sable-haired youth</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><font color = white> Interesting...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000b6];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">The optimistic, bright boy</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> No questions, let&#39;s begin..!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000b6];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> ...Verily.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#5a5a8c><a href=?src=[0x30000b6];action=name;character=0cffdd18de5c8680e368289f9bdf398f3cdddf405696c9e6a00949f77b717dd4 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #5a5a8c;">The late bloomer</a> Being quite content with keeping to himself, the last thing he anticipated was someone waltzing up to strike a conversation. After all, given the circumstances, he figured most folks around were probably younger than him. It was a tough pill to swallow, being on the older side yet perched on such a low position of the shinobi ladder.

Still, he managed to conjure up a sheepish grin in return, refusing to let rudeness take over. <font color = white>&#34;Kaoru.&#34;</font> He replied, giving a brief introduction..</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> No questions. Only answers.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako takes a bold step foward.</font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;Ap-ap. You didn&#39;t answer a question- back up.&#34;</font> </font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#95ff95>All the students gathered infront of the Konohagakure memorial, the woman reached behind her to grip her hand against the &#39;weapon&#39;. A fancy stick with several tags around it.
  She pulled out an attachment, a small spade like object that she wiggled into place on the top of her staff. The tool now resembles a hoe.

<font color = white>&#34;Welcome to Konoha&#39;s academy course. Ya&#39;ll be training to be shinobi that defends the lands of Fire, we shinobi are the heartline of this nation - Just like farmers.&#34;</font>

 Komo tosses her hoe hard towards the dirt behind the students, piercing and parting the dirt with force.

<font color = white>&#34;Instead of feeding mouths, we shinobi solves and prevent those farmer&#39;s problems from interrupting them making harvest.&#34;</font>

A hand extended facing the handed tool, as it suddenly came back to her grasp. <font color = white>&#34;To do that, we practice and master the use of all life force Chakra. Before we git to all that...&#34;</font>

The woman places the hoe back to her rear, facing the memorial.

<font color = white>&#34;This memorial is what we call tribute, tribute to all the shinobi that has succeeded their limits for their nation, some giving up their lives for you to even breathe and be born. The Will of Fire. If you disrespect this, you&#39;re disrespecting your births. A sly grin forms.

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako <i>gasps.</i>

Immediately, she clutched her precious eleven bucks tight, like a mother hen concealing chicks beneath their wing. Protective! Suspecting! Aggressive!
 
<font color = white>&#34;Betting?! My day&#39;s earnings? On a game like this?! I--&#34;</font>

She paused, to heed the large words of the officer. Her expression blanched, blanked, with nothing but radio static playing in her mind. 

<font color = white>&#34;..err. What she said. All those terrible things will happen if I wage my ryo! But.. if I must.. I&#39;ll bet ten! Not my special eleventh ryo.&#34;</font> </font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;Sure..! We can do 10. Your ten against my ten. How&#39;s that sound?&#34;</font> He asks, as he holds onto the dice tight and suddenly rolls them onto the ground.

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff7c80"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=ca666fbaf72d8fe2475c95438a72e1d5ff248468c8f2adc712cc5aee169b9a0a style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff7c80;">The police chief</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ff7c80"><font color = white> ...</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> I&#39;m amazed someone like you has pride.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Pride is a disease.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Pride Schmide! Let&#39;s keep going! </font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> A cracker.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako yells:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Give me.. a three!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> ...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff7c80"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=ca666fbaf72d8fe2475c95438a72e1d5ff248468c8f2adc712cc5aee169b9a0a style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff7c80;">The police chief</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ff7c80"><font color = white> ...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako sloooowly inched her sandal towards the dice, preparing to give it a nudge. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font size=-4><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> OOCs<font color = white>: (Walk into MY village, call ME a cracker, fuck MY bitches </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> crosses her legs as she sits down, retrieving a flask from her haori.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">The optimistic, bright boy</a> watches that one come, with glee. With joy. Finally, he would get the ten ryo that he had so desperately wanted.

Another successful hustle! Another successful bamboozle!

He extends a hand towards her.

<font color = white>&#34;Good game, Hanako. Pay up. You get to keep your one special ryo, though.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#99ffcc><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=b9351ed3a270ddd5464dcb5ee63a9a1e7cb427e4a5ea97e0622c681fb994b9af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #99ffcc;">The chill young boy</a> yawns. The nap he had was nice.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Hold it. Are you children gambling?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Congratulations.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako produced ten crispy (slightly moistened) bills from her stack. 
<font color = white>&#34;Yes..&#34;</font> 

A brush of thumb fans them out like playing cards. She takes her time inspecting their faces, their authentication codes as per mint standard, admiring their old-man faces. Reflected in their pale green eyes, she could see all the precious memories that brought them together; playing a complicated red-light green-light, and..

    ...and... 

.. actually, that&#39;s about it! Yep. Participation reward, and then the dive into her pocket because she had to go hear a speech. Good times. The best of times. She extended the bills to their new owner, entirely lacking in sadness, despite this departure. 

How could she feel disappointment, seeing the other kid look so giddy over receiving these funds?! Haa. That&#39;s probably the exact same face she wore when she first acquired them. Right?

<font color = white>&#34;.. take good care of these. Remember how good it feels.. to receive ten ryo. Take it from me. I&#39;ve learned.. it&#39;s a feeling that does not last forever.&#34;</font>

Winds thread through her blond locks as she turned her gaze to the sky, akin to a meditative Bodhisattva arriving at an epiphany. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> I see. This decision has caused a severely traumatic scene to unfold.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Halt this.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Gamble with pretend money.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Boy, if you accept those funds, I will punish you thusly.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> nods her head, content with the extended threat.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako asks:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Ehh? Aren&#39;t all funds made up?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako yells:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> They&#39;re just paper someone drew faces and numbers on!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Besides. He&#39;s my friend, so I don&#39;t mind if he has them! We&#39;ll call it payment for playing a game with me.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Pretend money has no value in the real world.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> That is a bad mindset, girl.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">The optimistic, bright boy</a> &#39;s eyes remain transfixed upon Hanako&#39;s demeanor and her apparent relationship with these bills, that had been acquired after such hard toil, a fierce game of red-light, green-light that was overly complicated but extremely fun. Even so, upon seeing the way that she stares at the money, he simply cannot feel as giddy and elated as he wanted to.

It seems like his plan to get her to go double or nothing, was quickly fading from his mind.

Could he summon forth the guts to take everything from her? To trick her into losing it all? To strip every single penny from her being?

Never had he hustled someone, and been called a friend for it!

He smiles awkwardly.

<font color = white>&#34;Hey... Umm... Friend.. What were you going to buy with this money?&#34;</font> He questions, as he scratches his cheek and suddenly finds the water behind them extremely interesting. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff7c80><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=ca666fbaf72d8fe2475c95438a72e1d5ff248468c8f2adc712cc5aee169b9a0a style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff7c80;">The police chief</a> sagely nods as the results unfold before her. Watching as Hanako speeds through the seven stages of grief was a nostalgic one- she, too, learned the horrors of gambling the hard way. 

<font color = white>&#34;Mm?&#34;</font> She waved off the noble&#39;s concerns. <font color = white>&#34;It&#39;s only the ten ryo I gave them earlier. Besides- people don&#39;t realize the weight money has until its gone.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff7c80"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=ca666fbaf72d8fe2475c95438a72e1d5ff248468c8f2adc712cc5aee169b9a0a style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff7c80;">The police chief</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ff7c80"><font color = white> Best to teach &#39;em early, mm&#39;hm.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> offers a light huff, before looking over the woman beside her. It's hard to tell if she's checking her out or wondering what she'd look like on an operating table. Still, she looks at the children, watching them. Judging the boy.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff7c80><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=ca666fbaf72d8fe2475c95438a72e1d5ff248468c8f2adc712cc5aee169b9a0a style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff7c80;">The police chief</a> wouldn't think much of the noble's engaged staring; the meaning behind their gaze was unclear, but she wasn't looking for it. With a hum, she, too, directs her attention back on the pair as they resolve(?) their game.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako tilted her head. 

<font color = white>&#34;Uhhh... ten ryo is a lot. A pack of cookies and maybe a carton of milk? Some candy with the leftovers? It&#39;s fine! I probably don&#39;t need it! Eat enough sweets and-- did you know? Your teeth will fall right out when you least expect it.&#34;</font> 

She flashed the red-head a grin! 
There was a stalk lack of missing teeth there. 
In fact, they were in mint condition. 

<font color = white>&#34;.. they&#39;re a pain to grow back. A super major headache. Don&#39;t worry! I&#39;m better off without it. Already over it. More importantly-- weren&#39;t we supposed to be at the mansion? Or.. was that postponed?&#34;</font> 

She leeeeaned sideways, looking past him, trying to make out any crowds in the distance. Sadly, her visual range was severely limited. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font size=-4><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako OOCs<font color = white>: [stark lack*]</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Ten ryo can nearly afford one of the cheaper books in my usual bookstore.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff7c80><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=ca666fbaf72d8fe2475c95438a72e1d5ff248468c8f2adc712cc5aee169b9a0a style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff7c80;">The police chief</a> a-hems!
<font color = white>&#34;Actually, they switched locations. Follow the water and you&#39;ll find them.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

He just needed to focus on how he would throw her.

His feet dug on the dirt beneath him as they adjusted themselves, and his grip became firm. Alright, he got it. <font color = white>&#34;Oh, and the name&#39;s Yuuto.&#34;</font>

<font color = white>&#34;O-Okay, your staff then! If I can do whatcha did to catch me and snowhead up there, then lemme hold it!&#34;</font> His eagerness was shot slightly, however, he still wanted to hold the staff.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako asks:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Do we stand on one another&#39;s shoulders?</font></font></font></span></span>

He crouched on the ground and adjsut his feet, both his hands were brought up. <font color = white>&#34;I&#39;ll try to launch you as far as I can, make sure to grab the wall and continue climbing or go for Shishorama.&#34;</font> He was pretty strong, he didn&#39;t know how far they would go, but better than on their own.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#66ff99"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">The baggy eye'd chuunin</a> says:</b><span style="color:#66ff99"><font color = white> The task is laid out for you, how you get it done is how a shinobi completes their mission.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#12745f"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#12745f"><font color = white> Okay okay... I&#39;ll be your lackey for three days if I fail! How&#39;s that sound?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The bushy-browed dweeb</a> turned and reached up on the cliff face for any sort of hand hold that would bare his weight even as he slid the fishing rod over his shoulder. He then took a step up, digging the toe of his sandal into the stone face and turning his foot so that he had more surface touching. With a hop he reached another hand-hold and began the systematic climbing of the cliff. He was warmed up now but he was also a little fatigued, so this was just as hard, if not harder, than the first level, and the stakes were much higher. 

Slowly, but surely he worked his way up to the next level. The distance was farther than before but the group was counting on him. Shishorama even cheered for him and let him make the climb first! She trusted him!

The youth winced and hissed as his forearms started to cramp up and his hands went numb with charlie horses but he continued on, stopping only to shake his hands when he felt confident he could hold himself up.

Once Try weakly pulled himself over the top he laid flat on his stomach and took big, gasping breaths for air.

A long moment later the fishing line and scarf were lowered down to the chill boy.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#4a6969><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=b50c547b25a3147f6ec374147486b4aa8928ded90c2d4fbedcfe690c644a296f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #4a6969;">The pale, red-eyed acrobat</a> doesn't grab her on the way up, no. She had been fired off with much too much force to try and slow her down. He could only watch as the pale girl shoots up and over him, to which he turns and waddles in place, determining where she would fall.

Her lightness worked to his advantage in this department. It was very simple to ease her falling into a simple motion, swinging himself around with the excess inertia and planting her firmly on the rocky, cliffside ground.

There was very little fanfare as far as she was concerned, her movements almost painfully efficient. One might even have gotten the impression she could scale the wall rather easily without any assistance at all.

And yet, she boosted through Yuuto's assistance, and extended both arms to grasp onto Shishorama, the zenith of her jump only barely missing the height of the ledge. Perfectly calculated to be easy, and swift.

A nod was offered to the pair then, even if she had to lean over the edge a bit to show her gratitude to Yuuto.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc99ff><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">The sable-haired youth</a> frowned without much to do in this case, it was mainly just watching as he trained with his chakra. it wasn&#39;t the worst thing but he was wondering what to do while he waited for people to pull up.

On the upside when there was someone to pull wwith five people pulling it asn&#39;t too difficult even if he lacked raw strength. As he heard someone whisper he&#39;d nod toward the Wandering Child.

<font color = white>&#34;Still would be easier if I could use chakra to help in this case.&#34;</font> He doubled down on that aspect.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">The optimistic, bright boy</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> Chakra..?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=fc7155ee74ec59d4c9b2e62be6a302c8489e8cb0693f8602fa3daed4d2f131e5 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff6600;">The overconfident kid</a> gave a thumbsup to the eccentric girl after she reached the top.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#99ffcc"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=b9351ed3a270ddd5464dcb5ee63a9a1e7cb427e4a5ea97e0622c681fb994b9af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #99ffcc;">The chill young boy</a> says:</b><span style="color:#99ffcc"><font color = white> meh</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">The sable-haired youth</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><font color = white> . . .Yes, Chakra.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The bushy-browed dweeb</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Alright!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako seemed entirely unafraid of zooming right into being tossed several meters into the air. An underdeveloped aversion to danger perhaps. Who knows! 

<font color = white>&#34;Oh, wow. I made it! Thanks!&#34;</font>

After getting properly yoinked and placed to the side like luggage (with a fragile label on it), she found herself delivered to the next stage! A system of fishing line pulleys meant to lift them the rest of the way. Uh--

<font color = white>&#34;Are these really strong enough to hold an entire person? Eh. We&#39;ll see!&#34;</font>
 
As the designated crash test dummy, she twisted a double-wound grip around the fishing lines and held tight!

<font color = white>&#34;<i>O-kaaaay</i>, reel me up!&#34;</font> 
She lets them work their give-man-strong magic!</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font size=-4><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako OOCs<font color = white>: [five-man-strong*]</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The bushy-browed dweeb</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Alright guys. <br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The bushy-browed dweeb</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> The ole HEAVE HO!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">The intense youngster</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> This is wonderful!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#468ca3"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=f61a8a99ebea0ae5eb4c51eff20f4e2e71d5611c015e0483034fed646d017940 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #468ca3;">The wandering child</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#468ca3"><font color = white> H-HEAVE!</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">The intense youngster</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> Goooo!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">The optimistic, bright boy</a> takes steps towards the fishing line and merely observes for a few moments, to see if it truly worked exactly like it was supposed to.

<font color = white>&#34;Huh... This is pretty smart... If the fishing line holds, that is.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako yells:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Heave!!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#468ca3><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=f61a8a99ebea0ae5eb4c51eff20f4e2e71d5611c015e0483034fed646d017940 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #468ca3;">The wandering child</a> began tugging back on the rod with EVERYTHING he had.

<font color = white>&#34;Lets do this!&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#12745f><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> rolled his eyes, abjuring to their remarks. Though, it seemed they in fact weren&#39;t on the strong suit, food for thought he supposed.

There was an advantage to this feat, however; Shun&#39;Ichi was going to do something unorthodox to his experience: he was attempting to mimick Komo&#39;s Body Flicker, albeit with only the process of controlling chakra.

Assuming the lady wouldn&#39;t simply show him again, Shun&#39;Ichi improvised.
He remembers reading a bit on the tiger seal; the de-facto sign to focus chakra within the human body; Shinobi works was more his sister&#39;s talent, however the prospect of chakra control always intruigued him.
Time to display that feat in full flux; with his feet upon the wall and the centre of balance upon his heart--Shun&#39;Ichi placed his index and middle fingers on each hand together, and closed his eyes.
Five seconds pass, he recognizes a spark of energy within his belly, chakra.
Ten seconds now, each second is taken spreading chakra throughout his body, before sending it primarily to his legs.
Five more seconds, he feels a sensation unfamiliar to his physical body; and it provides slack for his heart, the chakra to his feet seem to be stitching him to the mountain.

Shun&#39;Ichi wastes zero time, he rushed up the mountain all the way to a point just short of the peak, he shifts around glncing at the Chuunin once more.
<font color = white>&#34;Still think I&#39;m not up to par yet?!&#34;</font> He goads, though while doing so, he recognizes a fault in his prowess: <i>Reserve.</i>

Immediately the boy scrambles his hands onto the wall, realizing how much strain he&#39;s just placed on his body with that simple feat. He&#39;s in a huff, relying on his own desperation and the Kaguya duo&#39;s willingness to hang on to remain.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako yells:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Aa--Aaughh, these rocks are a little scrape-ish!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako yells:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> But I&#39;m fine!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc99ff><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">The sable-haired youth</a> assumed Chakra was common knowledge and not just horded clan knowledge, taught to their offspring. He was probably  wrong but he had no time to explain before pulling with all his might.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The bushy-browed dweeb</a> pulled, trying to work in sync with the other four members of his moving squad. They had done the hard work getting up there manually and now some ingenuity would help with the others.

He groaned as Hanako let them reel her up without her own help. He was expecting the people to climb up as well, but with two lines it should have been possible.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako was blissfully ignorant of what may have been a helpful thing to do. It simply hadn&#39;t occurred to her that climbing along was an option! Despite enduring bumps and shoving away from the wall where she could to avoid injury!
 
<font color = white>&#34;Don&#39;t act like a fish! Got it! I&#39;ll be as land-creature as I can be! Uh-- my hands get pruny in water, gah, I hate that!&#34;</font> 

How was she so heavy? Well-- she was drenched from, again, going through the river twice to get here! 

<font color = white>&#34;Wait--&#34;</font>

Ah. Finally someone said it out loud. <font color = white>&#34;I&#39;m supposed to climb? Ohh...&#34;</font>

She found a nice little set of edges to hook her fingers and sandal-tip onto and started to support some of her own weight along the way. <font color = white>&#34;Ah, hey. It&#39;s a little faster this way. You&#39;re really smart, handstand guy!&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=fc7155ee74ec59d4c9b2e62be6a302c8489e8cb0693f8602fa3daed4d2f131e5 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff6600;">The overconfident kid</a> sighed.. damn, that was a lot of energy he put into this. Looking up, he could feel his muscles starting to cry as he would need to get back up again. He had the stamina to help so many people, but even so, he hadn&#39;t thought this through on needing to go back up.

Well, that was his duty... and so, he starts climbing back up, holding back cusses every step of the way, but the time he reached the ledge, he was already extending his hand to Shishomaru. <font color = white>&#34;Need some help...&#34;</font></font></font></font>

She indeed saw some potential in the boy&#39;s chakra control, however potential is just that... Potential.

<font color = white>&#34;Nope.&#34;</font> A single word was said, before she looked over towards the others still working.

She would look around at the class of students, seeing most at the top. She folded her arms on top of her vest as a breath squeaked passed her teeth.

<font color = white>&#34;I see that most of you understood the exercise. A lesson as well as a workout to go along with it. So, lets call it a day right now.

Tomorrow, we&#39;ll work on your mental strengths to go with your physical strength. This is the beginning of Chakra. Now climb down and rest up tomorrow. You all are gonna need it for what comes next.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

He was simply unaware of her elasticity.

<font color = white>&#34;Uhh... Kurorama! Who was first? Who won?&#34;</font> He questions, taking steps towards the Senju to stare into her eyes very intently.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The bushy-browed dweeb</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Alright!</font></font></font></span></span>

It seemed as if the Chunnin was prepaired for just about anything. Worse however it seemed it was encouraging people to jump down the mountain. Quick as it might have been he was not about to temp fate.

Stepping down back upon the earth climbing down would prove to be as much as a challenge as going up. yet same as before he climbed at his own pace.</font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;This is your fault, Seito.&#34;</font> She mumbled, peering down at her prey with dangerous, red eyes. For just a moment, he received a breather. <font color = white>&#34;Out ya&#39; go.&#34;</font> In a few strokes of her free arm, she drags him to the shore, where he&#39;d be free to hoist himself out at his leisure. <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#12745f><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> creaked his neck upsettingly, moving over toward the mountain top again, <font color = white>&#34;Don&#39;t blame your brother for your mistakes, dumbass..&#34;</font> He affirmed, before climbing the mountain to reach her. She probably hasn&#39;t calmed down, but then again, what did he say that upsetted her so.

He didn&#39;t use chakra this time, getting the feeling he&#39;s going to have to recover slightly in order to flee again.

<font color = white>&#34;And can probably wear you out before you knock me out... <br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> ...Doubtfully.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako tilted her head. 

<font color = white>&#34;Huh? Just air dry. It only takes a minute.&#34;</font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=fc7155ee74ec59d4c9b2e62be6a302c8489e8cb0693f8602fa3daed4d2f131e5 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff6600;">The overconfident kid</a> watches the dancer and the punk's interaction with some interest for now, at the very least hoping that there wouldn't be any violence among classmates. Unsure if it happened already since it was out of his sight before.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The bushy-browed dweeb</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> There&#39;s something about being sore from hard exercise that just feels good.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajame</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> ..</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Er. <br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The bushy-browed dweeb</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Yeah. <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#b24a55><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=353e3f61154579756ccb0358ccd5c7c725bcdac2e6ef11cc728d031650c5693d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b24a55;">The aloof, white-haired dancer</a> stomped a loose rock, sending a shower of pebbles down on Shun'ichi, his latest words only inflaming her scorn. She wheeled around on her brother, and weighed the pro's and cons of striking him, too. Her blood was boiling with the characteristic lust of her heritage...

They were lucky she was tired from climbing the rocks.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Ah.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The bushy-browed dweeb</a> whispers<font color = white>: Pulling Hanako up.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The bushy-browed dweeb</a> side-eyes Hanako.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajame</a> stares down at his completely drenched self.

He waits approximately sixty seconds, before he glances up at her.

<font color = white>&#34;It&#39;s not happening. Did you...?&#34;</font> 

A brow quirks.

Bizarre!</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> did not speak further on the topic, her lips just pressed together in a thin line.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#12745f"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> says:</b><span style="color:#12745f"><font color = white> Oww owwwiwowwowowowow...</font></font></font></span></span>

Then she snatched him up in some weird sort of way, then he turned to Try.

<font color = white>&#34;You should&#39;ve been here to lift the fat kid that made my rib cage concave.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">The sable-haired youth</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><font color = white> Easy- To keep non-nobles safe so that they aren&#39;t pulling more weight than they need to.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> There were glowing jellyfish serving as chandeliers.</font></font></font></span></span>

<font color = white>&#34;I&#39;m not really great at Katon... or Genjutsu... or chakra control at all.&#34;</font> It was a bit embarassing to admit that outloud. <font color = white>&#34;But I won&#39;t lose to others when it comes to my strength!&#34;</font> He closed his hand into a fist amd tapped it against his chest.</font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;What about the family tradition..? <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako lacked much experience with animals, truth be told, given their aversion to her for reasons beyond her comprehension. But! Dogs, like most land creatures, enjoyed food. Meat especially. Of that, she is certain, from all those times she&#39;s witnessed strays going nuts over discarded karage. 

Along their travels, she found the trash can in question, right outside the local BBQ joint and--!

With a paper towel bearing hand, she procured some almost-cleaned rib bones, entirely overlooking any repulsed stares from her peers. She went about, waving the bone along, calling out in her sweetest animal-baby-talk tone.

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=1129b5da336b3219bb96ed46ffb7117dadffb655d55afe27b38681af88991fd1 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The hokage</a> looked over to his side and then looked down at the smaller child who elbowed him. He&#39;d cock a brow before furrowing both of his brows. 

<font color = white>&#34;Is this the disrespect you show your hokage? To just elbow bump themwhen they are deep in thought?&#34;</font>
</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc9900><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=ddb1a06d8071a5e608470f59d3b62e03ae10075fe6b393e0338ed5ef61682b43 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc9900;">The captain</a> turned to look towards the young girl casually make her way towards the lord Hokage and attempt to elbow bump him. A subtle shifting of himself and the single utilizeation of a handsign would place him betweem the pair in a flash of smoke, preventing her from doing so. 

<font color = white>&#34;Please show proper decorum when addressing and getting close to the lord hokage.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font size=-4><font color=#cc9900><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=ddb1a06d8071a5e608470f59d3b62e03ae10075fe6b393e0338ed5ef61682b43 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc9900;">The captain</a> OOCs<font color = white>: (ah, you beat me too it, I wasn&#39;t gonna let her actually touch you )</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">Senju, Kurorama</a> parted with a gentle sigh, the girl just wasn&#39;t getting it...! A hand raised, pressing to her chest respectfully.

<font color = white>&#34;Please forgive her doofy nature, Captain Akitaru. She&#39;s not quite accustomed. As said my name is Kurorama, of the Senju. My goal is to become a valuable asset of the village-- a pillar that strives to keep the Will of Fire burning. And, one day, if I may be so bold, I would wish to hold office as the Hokage.&#34;</font>

Sssspeeeaaaking of, said Kage had just appeared. Oh no, this was quite the audience.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#a06d87><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=7026d78d56a1fe983d2984f627d0b08bc99cdeb69fb899b3c7af8c72ade0049d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #a06d87;">The crimson eyed gambler</a> would side eye the senju as he wanted to stand inbtween the duo.The girl would burst into laughter.

<font color = white>&#34;Geesh I see you&#39;re going with the dull kage huh?Come on,I know you like to have a bit of fun.&#34;</font>they would nudgethe hokage once more again.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Huh. Wait. Captain?! Oh-- This guy. This guy must be someone important. Whoops!

She straightened her posture and stood at attention-- wait. He was no longer standing here. He was.. down the road now?! Fast. Well, for now, she just continued standing stiff as a wooden plank, not saying a word! Observing the events play out. <br>(Hozuki, Hanako)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color=#ffcc00><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">Senju, Kurorama</a> whispers<font color = white>: Hanako. Please listen to me. Those two-- the white-haired ones. They&#39;re the two most important people in the village.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc9900><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=ddb1a06d8071a5e608470f59d3b62e03ae10075fe6b393e0338ed5ef61682b43 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc9900;">The captain</a> didn&#39;t even blink, as the girl attempted to once more touch the hokage, he moved swiftly, grabbing her by the shoulder and waist and, almost artisticly, tossing her over the wall into the water. His face remained impartial and stoic, never once betraying emotion. His voice was much the same as he spoke. 

<font color = white>&#34;You will not be warned a third time. Do not attempt to touch the lord Hokage without his express consent.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako nods eight times in the span of one second. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako whispers<font color = white>: Are.. we in trouble?</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#a06d87><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=7026d78d56a1fe983d2984f627d0b08bc99cdeb69fb899b3c7af8c72ade0049d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #a06d87;">The crimson eyed gambler</a> would sigh at the senju as they some how became the voice for the kage.

<font color = white>&#34;Since your hand is there mind giving me a rub?&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color=#ffcc00><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">Senju, Kurorama</a> whispers<font color = white>: No, not us. But it&#39;s exceedingly important that we don&#39;t make any mistakes. It could potentially stall our careers.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color=#ffcc00><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">Senju, Kurorama</a> whispers<font color = white>: ...As the girl is aptly demonstrating.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=1129b5da336b3219bb96ed46ffb7117dadffb655d55afe27b38681af88991fd1 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The hokage</a> showed a smirk as he turned to the two. 

<font color = white>&#34;Ah.. its okay, they are young afterall. Not many know the correct ways of decorum when addressing their superious. It will need to be taught in the academy.&#34;</font> The man slightly tilted his head back as his chin was raised, lowering his gaze onto the young Uchiha more. 

<font color = white>&#34;Tell me child, what is your name?&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc9900><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=ddb1a06d8071a5e608470f59d3b62e03ae10075fe6b393e0338ed5ef61682b43 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc9900;">The captain</a> removed himself from the situation at that point, the lord Hokage now had this handled. His job had been completed in a manner approptiate his station. 

<font color = white>&#34;Of course, Lord Hokage&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">Senju, Kurorama</a> parted with a quiet &#39;Hemm&#39;, and tried to nudge the blonde.

<font color = white>&#34;Introduce yourself.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#a06d87><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=7026d78d56a1fe983d2984f627d0b08bc99cdeb69fb899b3c7af8c72ade0049d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #a06d87;">The crimson eyed gambler</a> would frown once seeing that the older senju didn&#39;t bless her with an awsome back rub.

<font color = white>&#34;My name is Senju Kumirama,pleasure to meet you!&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako had exactly zero refined etiquette skills. Naturally. She&#39;s has yet to even enter the Academy. Addressing individuals of note was beyond her limited skill range. But! She was able to follow helpful instructions, at the very least. 

A nudge and direction was just what she needed!

<font color = white>&#34;I&#39;m Hanako. I&#39;m, uh.. planning to join the Academy soon? Your.. <i>Captainship</i>?&#34;</font> She strained the last word together, having zero idea how to work with titles beyond what she&#39;s seen in novels about Lords. Surely that&#39;s how all titles worked, right? Lord equals Lordship! 

<font color = white>&#34;I, uh, look forward to learning!&#34;</font> She folds her hands at her waist and gauged their expression. Searching for any tells that she&#39;s scuffed up this introduction! </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcccc><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=1129b5da336b3219bb96ed46ffb7117dadffb655d55afe27b38681af88991fd1 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcccc;">The hokage</a> nodded his head. 

<font color = white>&#34;Interesting, I mistook you for an Uchiha. Your clans seem to have more and more similiar features with every passing generation. Noted. Senju Kumirama, ill be sure to have the Academy Sensei properly train you in your decorum.&#34;</font>

He&#39;d sigh as he looked up to the sky. <font color = white>&#34;Anyways,  I Should be off, the  hour is late and I am sure that we will have a very busy day tomorrow.&#34;</font> The Kaguya paused as he looked toward the older Senju. 

<font color = white>&#34;Captain, please be sure that this one specifically is made an example of infront of the class. I will not have soldier in Konoha&#39;s army that do not know proper decorum. Those who lack decorum, lack discpline, those who lack discpline do not follow orders, those who do not follow orders get their comrades killed.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font size=-4><font color=#ffcccc><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=1129b5da336b3219bb96ed46ffb7117dadffb655d55afe27b38681af88991fd1 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcccc;">The hokage</a> OOCs<font color = white>: (im checking out to rest. been at it for a long while now</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc9900><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=ddb1a06d8071a5e608470f59d3b62e03ae10075fe6b393e0338ed5ef61682b43 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc9900;">The captain</a> regarded Hanako for a short while. 

<font color = white>&#34;I am the lead jounin of the village, and Commander of the twelve Guardians, Senju, Akitaru. You may Address me as Commander Senju or Akitaru Sensei, whichever you prefer.&#34;</font>

He nodded to the girl and the other senju standing beside her, giving them both a chance to say something in response. His head turned to bow towards the Hokage and nod. 

<font color = white>&#34;I&#39;ll let the teachers know. Thank you for her oppertunity to learn, Lord Hokage.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00><a href=?src=[0x30000c8];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">Senju, Kurorama</a> dismissed the notion of family entirely-- in her mind, she hadn&#39;t yet earned the right to address him with familial tone.

<font color = white>&#34;Yes, Commander Senju.&#34;</font>

<font color = white>&#34;I see. I don&#39;t plan to teach, I have other tasks I&#39;ll be handleing, but, if you run into a question you need answered?&#34;</font>

<font color = white>&#34;Now... Kohaku, any clue where we take this thing. I can get the bounty and treat all of us for some pork buns.&#34;</font> He nodded at Kumirama, he would get her those pork buns she seemed to want.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#6699ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=bed3b965f237f8de692af8fc59860620eaefa1b354bed90e6ec0e0e775aba4a7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #6699ff;">The black-haired girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#6699ff"><font color = white> Simple.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc0000"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=479d53a6157a9e1a0cf6b71f58c22a0abdbdcdecd92df15464c38cd1ec506fb7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc0000;">The reserved preteen</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc0000"><font color = white> Komo sensei.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc0000"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=479d53a6157a9e1a0cf6b71f58c22a0abdbdcdecd92df15464c38cd1ec506fb7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc0000;">The reserved preteen</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#cc0000"><font color = white> Did you get my registration?</font></font></font></span></span>

Whats your name?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#9933ff><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=aff3621fb45a9d3e9181cfa0411b2bfa3114510da90707e8f4a0396c8d5e9974 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9933ff;">The dark haired boy</a> falls down onto his knees, laying down on the ground. closing his eyes.

<font color = white>&#34;...This darn academy..&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366cc"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=4cc36a72cb702167c193e2a036ccb46053411d83eb10f3158bd62b54562f93d3 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #3366cc;">The blissful youth</a> says:</b><span style="color:#3366cc"><font color = white> I am Senju.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc0000"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=479d53a6157a9e1a0cf6b71f58c22a0abdbdcdecd92df15464c38cd1ec506fb7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc0000;">The reserved preteen</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc0000"><font color = white> Uchiha, Batsu.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako yells:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> It&#39;s okay, Lost! You can find your way to success!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#9c9ce3><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=03746b058993664f99d07a5e283cf8525710bb47d3393b4df7ed35442e86fdba style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9c9ce3;">Gorumba, Maya</a> walked up towards the teacher, slipping a ryo in her sash.

<font color = white>&#34;I&#39;m sure I won&#39;t fail.&#34;</font>

A smile given towards the old Shinobi before dropping her voice lower in a whisper, but still audible to all those around if they listened.

<font color = white>&#34;There&#39;s more where that&#39;s from if I pass with straight A grades.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> See? The first step&#39;s already here. Sign up to join the Academy with Sensei--</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#9933ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=aff3621fb45a9d3e9181cfa0411b2bfa3114510da90707e8f4a0396c8d5e9974 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9933ff;">The dark haired boy</a> says:</b><span style="color:#9933ff"><font color = white> Does success equal sleeping..</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#66ff99"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">The baggy eye'd chuunin</a> says:</b><span style="color:#66ff99"><font color = white> I did, I see your name here.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako looks away. <font color = white>&#34;I&#39;ll do good,&#34;</font> she murmured, lying through her teeth. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#6699ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=bed3b965f237f8de692af8fc59860620eaefa1b354bed90e6ec0e0e775aba4a7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #6699ff;">The black-haired girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#6699ff"><font color = white> I look forward to see you top of the class.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> y-Yeah..</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><font color = white> If you don&#39;t we&#39;ll help you pass.... Somehow.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#66ff99><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">The baggy eye'd chuunin</a> looked at the single ryo as she simply threw it into the river.

<font color = white>&#34;I ain&#39;t no wishing well.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#9966ff><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=a74410993ad7da70127401a532b5912317aa4c8c5a49aeef3d42663bce70d922 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9966ff;">Hyuuga, Hinoue</a> crossed her arms as she turns to walk past Hajime, briefly sticking her tongue out before halting closer to the others, <font color = white>&#34;I think I&#39;ll have a better time watching you open your grades and hide from me afterwards. Because you did worse.&#34;</font> She had to clarify that last part... Obviously.

<font color = white>&#34;My clan only excels and succeeds after all.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#9933ff><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=aff3621fb45a9d3e9181cfa0411b2bfa3114510da90707e8f4a0396c8d5e9974 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9933ff;">The dark haired boy</a> leaned back up, staring at the sky before sighing.

<font color = white>&#34;I will get my family back for this...&#34;</font> He mumbled, raising a single fist in the air.,</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366cc"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=4cc36a72cb702167c193e2a036ccb46053411d83eb10f3158bd62b54562f93d3 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #3366cc;">The blissful youth</a> says:</b><span style="color:#3366cc"><font color = white> Seems they are doing the bonding.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#9c9ce3><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=03746b058993664f99d07a5e283cf8525710bb47d3393b4df7ed35442e86fdba style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9c9ce3;">Gorumba, Maya</a> raised a single eyebrow, slipping into her pouch as she removes a wad of of over three-hundred ryo. In a hushed voice she spoke.

<font color = white>&#34;So, what&#39;s the price then?&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#6699ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=bed3b965f237f8de692af8fc59860620eaefa1b354bed90e6ec0e0e775aba4a7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #6699ff;">The black-haired girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#6699ff"><font color = white> -</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#66ff99><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">The baggy eye'd chuunin</a> looked over at the blissful youth.

<font color = white>&#34;Are you Kumirama?&#34;</font></font></font></font>
