<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#66ff99"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">The baggy eye'd chuunin</a> says:</b><span style="color:#66ff99"><font color = white> I have no price.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#9933ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=aff3621fb45a9d3e9181cfa0411b2bfa3114510da90707e8f4a0396c8d5e9974 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9933ff;">The dark haired boy</a> says:</b><span style="color:#9933ff"><font color = white> Kumirama is not over here.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> squints, and soon clenches a fist..! Her gesture draws a slightly reddened face from the young man, in frustration.

<font color = white>&#34;We&#39;ll see about that.&#34;</font>

He turns away from her, and soon forces a smile as he takes steps towards the two girls in the distance.

<font color = white>&#34;Hello. I&#39;m Hajime. Nice to meet you both.&#34;</font>

A single fist extends forth, towards them. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#9966ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=a74410993ad7da70127401a532b5912317aa4c8c5a49aeef3d42663bce70d922 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9966ff;">Hyuuga, Hinoue</a> says:</b><span style="color:#9966ff"><font color = white> Prove you&#39;re rich.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#66ff99><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">The baggy eye'd chuunin</a> looks at her fancy clothes.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#9c9ce3><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=03746b058993664f99d07a5e283cf8525710bb47d3393b4df7ed35442e86fdba style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9c9ce3;">Gorumba, Maya</a> with a sigh she&#39;d instead remove the largest fish she had recently caught, handing it over towards the instructor before stepping back next to Hanako.

<font color = white>&#34;Well, I&#39;m sure I&#39;ll do great at school, teacher.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#9966ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=a74410993ad7da70127401a532b5912317aa4c8c5a49aeef3d42663bce70d922 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9966ff;">Hyuuga, Hinoue</a> says:</b><span style="color:#9966ff"><font color = white> Hm... Acceptable.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> She does look rich.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> Hey, hey. Komo-sensei. How&#39;d you get rich?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako glanced left. 
She glanced right.

It looks like the coast was clear. As long as she ignored the twenty eyeballs within the vicinity. Conditions were perfect. She tip-toed her way over to the guard rail. 

<i>Aaaand</i> slowly started to climb over the obstacle. Her eyes were glued to that discarded single ryo bill. She could buy some candy with that. What a waste! To let it flow away on the current!</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#6699ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=bed3b965f237f8de692af8fc59860620eaefa1b354bed90e6ec0e0e775aba4a7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #6699ff;">The black-haired girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#6699ff"><font color = white> Hm..</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#66ff99><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">The baggy eye'd chuunin</a> grabs the raw fish that was given to her by the kombu green haired girl. She savagly bite into the raw fish in its mid section, devouring everything until stuffing the rest of the fish into her mouth, tail end last.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#a06d87><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=7026d78d56a1fe983d2984f627d0b08bc99cdeb69fb899b3c7af8c72ade0049d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #a06d87;">The crimson eyed gambler</a> would clear their throat as she slips the uchiha a list of food she wanted.The list contained three order of seaweed salad,ten chicken wings and some green tea ice cream.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#6699ff><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=bed3b965f237f8de692af8fc59860620eaefa1b354bed90e6ec0e0e775aba4a7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #6699ff;">The black-haired girl</a> wasn't sure if she should be frightened or impressed by the display.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#b24a55><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=353e3f61154579756ccb0358ccd5c7c725bcdac2e6ef11cc728d031650c5693d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b24a55;">The aloof, white-haired dancer</a> bumped a swollen fist against his.

<font color = white>&#34;Kamiya.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#66ff99"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">The baggy eye'd chuunin</a> says:</b><span style="color:#66ff99"><font color = white> Working hard is a good start. Finding more doors to make money.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#9966ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=a74410993ad7da70127401a532b5912317aa4c8c5a49aeef3d42663bce70d922 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9966ff;">Hyuuga, Hinoue</a> says:</b><span style="color:#9966ff"><font color = white> Being born rich helps too.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366cc><font color = white>&#34;I am Sakuya Senju.&#34;</font> She turns to the bright boy and extends her hand. <font color = white>&#34;Nice to meet you as well, Hajime.&#34;</font><br>(<a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=4cc36a72cb702167c193e2a036ccb46053411d83eb10f3158bd62b54562f93d3 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #3366cc;">The blissful youth</a>)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> Why&#39;s your fist swollen?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc99ff><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku</a> watched Hanako go after the ryo, he didn't care- No one else seemed to care, therefore it was fair game for the Platinum Blonde to go fishing for it. Though he stopped staring to wwatch the Headmistress become a savage and potentially poison herself  to mortify Children.

It seemed to be working.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> does not notice the antics of the headmistress, nor the missed opportunity of nabbing 1 ryo.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#9933ff><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=aff3621fb45a9d3e9181cfa0411b2bfa3114510da90707e8f4a0396c8d5e9974 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9933ff;">The dark haired boy</a> blinked a few times, watching how the women just devoured a raw fish, He thought for a second, Just staring at her before nodding.

<font color = white>&#34;Do all girls eat like?&#34;</font> He questioned.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#6699ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=bed3b965f237f8de692af8fc59860620eaefa1b354bed90e6ec0e0e775aba4a7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #6699ff;">The black-haired girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#6699ff"><font color = white> No.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#66ff99"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">The baggy eye'd chuunin</a> says:</b><span style="color:#66ff99"><font color = white> Not girls, but real women.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#9933ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=aff3621fb45a9d3e9181cfa0411b2bfa3114510da90707e8f4a0396c8d5e9974 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9933ff;">The dark haired boy</a> says:</b><span style="color:#9933ff"><font color = white> I see...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#9933ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=aff3621fb45a9d3e9181cfa0411b2bfa3114510da90707e8f4a0396c8d5e9974 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9933ff;">The dark haired boy</a> says:</b><span style="color:#9933ff"><font color = white> Impressive.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako flops over the guard rail, entirely lacking in grace, and sploshed into the river. 

A minute later, she emerged, blowing on the recovered bill, trying and failing to air-dry it. A soggy set of sandal-prints were left in her trail as she made her way back to Position A! Lurking beneath the street light. 

Drenched, but the grin she wore says she's elated by her mission accomplished. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#b24a55"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=353e3f61154579756ccb0358ccd5c7c725bcdac2e6ef11cc728d031650c5693d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b24a55;">The aloof, white-haired dancer</a> says:</b><span style="color:#b24a55"><font color = white> I pulled my finger out.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><font color = white> Entirely.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#9966ff><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=a74410993ad7da70127401a532b5912317aa4c8c5a49aeef3d42663bce70d922 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9966ff;">Hyuuga, Hinoue</a> looks to Maya as a fish was withdrawn from somewhere and stared at, <font color = white>&#34;Wait, that&#39;s not good for you--&#34;</font> The Hyuuga grimaced as the Gorumba&#39;s mouth opened to chow down - only to relax all of a sudden and exhale. All tension flows away, like that ryo bill in the river would have if not &#39;saved&#39; by Hanako.

She was puffing flames to cook it at the very last second... Scary, but... Not as poisonous as it could have been. The fish probably had scales and everything though, gross.

<font color = white>&#34;...I think fish isn&#39;t for me anymore.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#9c9ce3><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=03746b058993664f99d07a5e283cf8525710bb47d3393b4df7ed35442e86fdba style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9c9ce3;">Gorumba, Maya</a> removed a napkin from her pouch as she began to delicately dab at her lips in order to clean them of any fishy debris before turning her attention towards Hanako.

<font color = white>&#34;This river, I caught it myself...&#34;</font>

A simple answer to a straight forward questio as her head cocked to the side in a curious manner.

<font color = white>&#34;And it&#39;s a fresh as it comes, orphans can&#39;t be picky.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

The cuts aren&#39;t particularly deep, but she bled softly from the rake all the same. It doesn&#39;t take long for it to roll down to her jawline, and then drip to the cobblestone beneath.

<font color = white>&#34;Of course it hurts.&#34;</font> She replied, before moving to face the ugly, green-haired boy.

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#66ff99><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">The baggy eye'd chuunin</a> looked at the crowd. <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> accepts the yank!

He rises to his feet with her aid, a tad wobbly. He threatens to wobble in all four cardinal directions and fall again, due to the previous impact.

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc0000"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=479d53a6157a9e1a0cf6b71f58c22a0abdbdcdecd92df15464c38cd1ec506fb7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc0000;">The reserved preteen</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc0000"><font color = white> Hinoue.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#9966ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=a74410993ad7da70127401a532b5912317aa4c8c5a49aeef3d42663bce70d922 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9966ff;">Hyuuga, Hinoue</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#9966ff"><font color = white> Hm?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc0000"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=479d53a6157a9e1a0cf6b71f58c22a0abdbdcdecd92df15464c38cd1ec506fb7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc0000;">The reserved preteen</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#cc0000"><font color = white> Could I speak with you in private?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#b24a55><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=353e3f61154579756ccb0358ccd5c7c725bcdac2e6ef11cc728d031650c5693d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b24a55;">The aloof, white-haired dancer</a> relentlessly attacked, delivering another kick. He seemed to think this was some sort of game--

It was not, as the blood poured from her own rakes.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako noticed Hajime&#39;s unsteadiness.

A swirl that carried him east, north, west, south! Hm! Clearly the remedy for such things was to spin him in the opposite direction, as to unwind the factors that made him dizzy in the first place! So! She grasped him by the shoulders and spun him clockwise, akin to a kid being prepared for their turn at a pinata. 

<font color = white>&#34;It&#39;s okay! I&#39;ll just.. unspin you!&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Trust me. I&#39;m a medical professional. </font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako was not.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#9966ff><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=a74410993ad7da70127401a532b5912317aa4c8c5a49aeef3d42663bce70d922 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #9966ff;">Hyuuga, Hinoue</a> arched a brow inquisitively as the veiny protrusions spreading from those fainty lavender orbs would gradually soften and lose their prominence - no longer visible against skin. She wondered what could have prompted this request, but she doubts it was anything bad after witnessing her greatness just now.

<font color = white>&#34;Hm... Alright, sure,&#34;</font> she obliged, <font color = white>&#34;Lead the way.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300>Oh no.

<font color = white>&#34;W-wait..! Unspin..? Wah..!&#34;</font>

The unspinning has the opposite effect and he finds himself teetering even more, until he threatens to collapse right onto Hanako..! A hand rises to cover his mouth, as well.<br>(<a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a>)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako recognized that shade of green. Why-- that&#39;s the same shade of green she took on mere moments ago, watching Maya chomp on raw fish! She frantically circled him, intent on escaping his potential spew range!

<font color = white>&#34;Ack, abort, abandon mission! It didn&#39;t work! It didn&#39;t work!&#34;</font> </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#6699ff><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=bed3b965f237f8de692af8fc59860620eaefa1b354bed90e6ec0e0e775aba4a7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #6699ff;">The black-haired girl</a> pulled a chair out of her pocket and took a seat on the bridge to watch the commotions until something else happened.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366cc>Seeing that the situation has escalated beyond any hope of peaceful resolution, Sakuya joins Kamiya in taking decisive action against Shun&#39;Ichi. She launches into a coordinated assault, seamlessly blending their movements into a relentless series of kicks and stomps. What unfolds could be likened to what is widely known as <font color = white>&#34;being jumped,&#34;</font> <br>(<a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=4cc36a72cb702167c193e2a036ccb46053411d83eb10f3158bd62b54562f93d3 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #3366cc;">The blissful youth</a>)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><font color = white> ...Drowned?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> collapses to the ground, and though he keeps his mouth covered for a few moments, he soon breathes a sigh of relief.

He had avoided death itself. Or the death of his self-image for the foreseeable future.

Only after a few moments, does he tilt his head backwards while lying on the ground to finally realize that the fight was still ongoing.

<font color = white>&#34;W-woah... They&#39;re jumping that kid... &#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako asks:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Hm??</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773">Hozuki, Hanako says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Nah, they&#39;re just helping him out. Probably. He&#39;s clearly choking.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#6699ff><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=bed3b965f237f8de692af8fc59860620eaefa1b354bed90e6ec0e0e775aba4a7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #6699ff;">The black-haired girl</a> passes off the fish.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> No, no... <br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> Like, when you talk back against the big kid in the orphanage..</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> H-hey..! <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773>Hozuki, Hanako received a bunch of fish. She released them back to their natural habitat.

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=fc7155ee74ec59d4c9b2e62be6a302c8489e8cb0693f8602fa3daed4d2f131e5 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff6600;">The overconfident kid</a> slides the icecream over to the empty seat.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> whispers<font color = white>: Ugh...</font></font></font>

I&#39;m sure we should be making ourselves to class, but we have time to spare.&#34;</font> He stated mixing honey into his cup before taking a sip, turning towards Yakeru and Yuuto.

<font color = white>&#34;What do you think class will be about today?&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#6699ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=bed3b965f237f8de692af8fc59860620eaefa1b354bed90e6ec0e0e775aba4a7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #6699ff;">The black-haired girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#6699ff"><font color = white> -</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#12745f><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> felt a twinge of audacious spite creep up on his shoulders. To which he&#39;s forced to answer with his own deftness.
First order of business, getting away from Kamiya--she&#39;s the stronger one of the two, if his memory serves him correctly, so getting away from her would prove advantageous, forcing him to only deal with Sakuya.

He&#39;s never won a fight against her, though today&#39;s the day he might be given the chance to try.
Kamiya is evaded this time, with Sakuya being blocked. He uses Sakuya&#39;s weight to bounce away from the dynamic duo and more toward the riverbanks. The bell sounds, however, he knows the kids won&#39;t relent; and he doesn&#39;t plan on doing so either.
<font color = white>&#34;Coh&#39; aht meh... Bich&#39;s.&#34;</font> He states, as long as Kamiya&#39;s interrupted by Sakuya, he&#39;s safe, somewhat...</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> Hey, hey! <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=fc7155ee74ec59d4c9b2e62be6a302c8489e8cb0693f8602fa3daed4d2f131e5 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff6600;">The overconfident kid</a> sighed and scratched his head. <font color = white>&#34;Considering the location of the class... they said Kumirama&#39;s gonna drown... and the fact we just started the academy and have to learn the basic jutsus... we&#39;re probably gonna have to learn how to swim or walk on water.&#34;</font>

<font color = white>&#34;By the way, now that I think about all this, I can now confidently say.&#34;</font> He spoke with a sigh. <font color = white>&#34;Kumirama is not gonna be drowning alone.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> delivers the line that had gotten him stomped out at the orphanage many times.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#468ca3><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=f61a8a99ebea0ae5eb4c51eff20f4e2e71d5611c015e0483034fed646d017940 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #468ca3;">The amber-haired boy</a> took the final bite of his porkbun, finishing it off before swallowing it down.

<font color = white>&#34;I&#39;m not sure, I do remember her mentioning a mental workout.&#34;</font> he mentions before taking a sip of his juice.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#b24a55><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=353e3f61154579756ccb0358ccd5c7c725bcdac2e6ef11cc728d031650c5693d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b24a55;">The aloof, white-haired dancer</a> was on his ass. Was she lying about him being faster? It seemed like it...

Just as a punch is about to be thrown to his cranium, though, the dancer twisted her body away and cartwheeled to a standing position.

<font color = white>&#34;I head the academy bell. You&#39;re lucky.&#34;</font> she said, to the fat-tongued boy. <font color = white>&#34;You will apologize to me after class or you&#39;re going to keep getting this.&#34;</font> It wasn&#39;t a very hard demand to meet, luckily for him.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366cc>Sakuya stopped her assualt. It was time for class.

<font color = white>&#34;You can&#39;t be inconviencing us like this Shun.&#34;</font> She shrugs as she readies herself to leave.<br>(<a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=4cc36a72cb702167c193e2a036ccb46053411d83eb10f3158bd62b54562f93d3 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #3366cc;">The blissful youth</a>)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=fc7155ee74ec59d4c9b2e62be6a302c8489e8cb0693f8602fa3daed4d2f131e5 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff6600;">The overconfident kid</a> will definitely be drowning.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000c5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> breathes a sigh of relief once he sees that yet another stomping had been averted..! No doubt thanks to his efforts, as he had told them that stomping was wrong, and to cease. Clearly, this was a victory for him.

He rises to his feet after a few moments, still a bit wobbly, but he smiles regardless.

<font color = white>&#34;Y&#39;all wanna&#39; head to that lesson?&#34;</font> He asks, before his gaze focuses upon the one referred to as Shun.

Though, the Kaguya's sudden advancement did muddle him slightly... Just how much quicker has she gotten in the past few days...? And how quickly could she advance?

Well, there's a limit to how much power one could produce without actively dipping their toes into the Shinobi world... Perhaps it was simply a gap in skill as opposed to some innate talent or development. Yeah... That's probably it.
He ignores Hajime, watching the duo who nearly beat his ass strut off, enviously figuring out how to get some revenge.</font></font></font>
